name: Lasagna
ingredientsRecipe: 1 lb. ground beef, 1 chopped onion, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 1 (28 oz.) can crushed tomatoes, 1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste, 2 tbsp. sugar, 1 1/2 tsp. dried basil leaves, 2 tbsp. fennel seeds, Salt and pepper, to taste, 12 lasagna noodles, cooked, 1 (15 oz.) container ricotta cheese, 1 egg, 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese.
instructionsRecipe: 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). 2. In a large skillet, cook beef, onion, and garlic over medium heat until beef is brown; drain. 3. Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, sugar, basil, fennel seeds, salt, and pepper. 4. Spread 1/2 cup meat sauce in an ungreased 13x9 inch baking dish. 5. Arrange 3 noodles over sauce; spread with one-third of the ricotta cheese and one-third of the mozzarella cheese. 6. Repeat layers of meat sauce, noodles, ricotta cheese, and mozzarella cheese twice. 7. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. 8. Cover and bake for 25 minutes. 9. Uncover and bake until cheese is melted, about 10 minutes.

name: Hamburger
ingredientsRecipe: 1 lb. ground beef, 1 tsp. salt, 1/2 tsp. black pepper, 4 slices cheddar cheese, 4 hamburger buns, Lettuce, tomato, and condiments of your choice.
instructionsRecipe: 1. In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef, salt, and pepper. 2. Divide the mixture into 4 equal parts and shape each into a patty. 3. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook the patties until browned on both sides and cooked to your desired level of doneness. 4. Top each patty with a slice of cheese during the last minute of cooking. 5. Toast the hamburger buns. 6. Assemble the burgers with lettuce, tomato, and condiments of your choice.

name: Chicken Alfredo
ingredientsRecipe: 8 oz. fettuccine pasta, 1 lb. boneless skinless chicken breasts, diced, 4 tbsp. butter, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 cup heavy cream, 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese, Salt and pepper, to taste.
instructionsRecipe: 1. Cook the pasta according to package directions. 2. In a large skillet, cook chicken over medium heat until browned and cooked through. Remove from skillet and set aside. 3. In the same skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook until fragrant. 4. Stir in the heavy cream and Parmesan cheese and cook until the sauce is heated through. 5. Return the chicken to the skillet and season with salt and pepper to taste. 6. Serve the chicken mixture over the cooked pasta.

name: Pancakes
ingredientsRecipe: 1 cup all-purpose flour, 2 tbsp. sugar, 2 tsp. baking powder, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 cup milk, 1 egg, 2 tbsp. melted butter, 1 tsp. vanilla extract
instructionsRecipe: 1. In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. 2. In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla extract. 3. Add the wet ingredientsRecipe to the dry ingredientsRecipe and mix until just combined (the batter will still be lumpy). 4. Heat a large non-stick skillet over medium heat. Using a 1/4 cup measure, scoop the batter onto the skillet. 5. Cook until small bubbles form on the surface of the pancakes and the edges begin to look set, about 2-3 minutes. Flip the pancakes and cook until the other side is golden brown, about 2 minutes more. 6. Serve with syrup and butter.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredientsRecipe: 1 lb. spaghetti, 4 large eggs, 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 1 cup pancetta or bacon, diced, 4 cloves garlic, minced, Salt and pepper, to taste
instructionsRecipe: 1. Cook the spaghetti according to package directions. 2. In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs and Parmesan cheese. 3. In a large skillet, cook the pancetta over medium heat until crispy. Add the garlic and cook until fragrant. 4. Drain the spaghetti and add it to the skillet with the pancetta mixture. 5. Remove the skillet from heat and add the egg and Parmesan mixture, stirring until the spaghetti is coated. 6. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately.

name: Stir-Fry
ingredientsRecipe: 1 lb. boneless skinless chicken breast, sliced, 2 cups vegetables (such as broccoli, bell peppers, and carrots), sliced, 2 tbsp. oil, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tbsp. soy sauce, 1 tbsp. cornstarch, 2 tbsp. water
instructionsRecipe: 1. In a large skillet or wok, heat the oil over high heat. Add the chicken and stir-fry until browned and cooked through. Remove from skillet and set aside. 2. In the same skillet, stir-fry the vegetables until tender. Remove from skillet and set aside. 3. In the same skillet, add the garlic and stir-fry until fragrant. 4. In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, cornstarch, and water. 5. Return the chicken and vegetables to the skillet. Stir in the soy sauce mixture and cook until the sauce has thickened, about 2-3 minutes. 6. Serve over rice.

name: Beef Stroganoff
ingredientsRecipe: 1 lb. beef sirloin, sliced, 2 cups mushrooms, sliced, 1 onion, chopped, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tbsp. butter, 2 tbsp. flour, 1 cup beef broth, 1 cup sour cream, Salt and pepper, to taste
instructionsRecipe: 1. In a large skillet, brown the beef over medium heat. Remove from skillet and set aside. 2. In the same skillet, sauté the mushrooms, onion, and garlic in the butter until tender. 3. Stir in the flour and cook for 2 minutes. Gradually add the beef broth, stirring until smooth. 4. Return the beef to the skillet and bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to low and stir in the sour cream. 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve over noodles.

name: Potato Salad
ingredientsRecipe: 6 medium potatoes, boiled and diced, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 1/4 cup sour cream, 1 tbsp. dijon mustard, 2 green onions, chopped, Salt and pepper, to taste
instructionsRecipe: 1. In a large bowl, combine the potatoes, mayonnaise, sour cream, dijon mustard, and green onions. 2. Stir until the potatoes are coated. 3. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve chilled.

name: Tomato Soup
ingredientsRecipe: 1 tbsp. oil, 1 onion, chopped, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 2 cans diced tomatoes, 2 cups chicken broth, 1 tsp. sugar, Salt and pepper, to taste
instructionsRecipe: 1. In a large pot, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook until tender. 2. Add the diced tomatoes, chicken broth, and sugar. Bring to a simmer and cook for 10 minutes. 3. Using an immersion blender, blend the soup until smooth. 4. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot.

name: Grilled Cheese
ingredientsRecipe: 2 slices of bread, 2 slices of cheddar cheese, 2 tbsp. butter
instructionsRecipe: 1. Preheat a non-stick skillet over medium heat. 2. Place the cheese between the two slices of bread to make a sandwich. 3. Spread the butter on the outside of the sandwich. 4. Place the sandwich in the skillet and cook until the bread is golden brown and the cheese is melted, about 3-4 minutes per side. 5. Serve hot.

name: Fried Rice
ingredientsRecipe: 2 cups cooked rice, 2 tbsp. oil, 1 onion, chopped, 1 cup frozen vegetables, 2 eggs, beaten, 2 tbsp. soy sauce, Salt and pepper, to taste
instructionsRecipe: 1. In a large wok or skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. 2. Add the onion and cook until tender. 3. Stir in the frozen vegetables and cook for 3 minutes. 4. Push the vegetables to one side of the wok and add the beaten eggs to the other side. Scramble the eggs until cooked. 5. Stir in the rice and soy sauce. Cook for 2-3 minutes. 6. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
ingredientsRecipe: 1 lb. spaghetti pasta, 1 lb. ground beef, 1 onion, chopped, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 can diced tomatoes, 1 tbsp. tomato paste, 1 tsp. dried basil, Salt and pepper, to taste
instructionsRecipe: 1. Cook the pasta according to package instructionsRecipe. Drain and set aside. 2. In a large pot, brown the ground beef over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook until tender. 3. Stir in the diced tomatoes, tomato paste, and basil. Bring to a simmer. 4. Reduce heat to low and let the sauce simmer for 15 minutes. 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve over the cooked spaghetti.

name: Croatian Burek
ingredientsRecipe: 1 lb. phyllo dough, 1 lb. ground beef, 1 large onion, chopped, 1/2 cup oil, 1 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. pepper, 1 tsp. paprika, 1/2 tsp. cumin, 1/2 tsp. coriander.
instructionsRecipe: 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). 2. Brown the beef and onion in oil, then add the salt, pepper, paprika, cumin, and coriander. 3. Let the beef mixture cool. 4. Grease a large baking dish. 5. Layer 3-4 sheets of phyllo dough, brushing each layer with oil. 6. Add half of the beef mixture on top. 7. Repeat layers of phyllo dough and beef mixture. 8. Top with a final layer of phyllo dough, brushing with oil. 9. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until golden brown. 10. Serve hot.

name: Biryani
ingredientsRecipe: 2 lbs. bone-in chicken, 2 cups basmati rice, 3 cups water, 1 large onion, chopped, 1/2 cup oil, 1 tbsp. ginger paste, 1 tbsp. garlic paste, 2 tbsp. biryani masala, Salt, to taste, 1 cup yogurt, 2 tbsp. ghee, 1/2 cup fried onions, 1/2 cup fresh cilantro leaves, chopped.
instructionsRecipe: 1. Soak the basmati rice in water for 30 minutes, then drain. 2. In a large pot, heat the oil and fry the chopped onions until golden brown. 3. Add the chicken and fry until browned on all sides. 4. Add ginger paste, garlic paste, biryani masala, and salt. 5. Fry for 2-3 minutes. 6. Add the drained rice and fry for another 2-3 minutes. 7. Add water and bring to a boil. 8. Reduce the heat, cover the pot, and cook for 10-15 minutes. 9. In a separate bowl, mix the yogurt with ghee. 10. When the rice is cooked, add the yogurt mixture and mix gently. 11. Top with fried onions and chopped cilantro leaves. 12. Serve hot.

name: Kimchi
ingredientsRecipe: 2 lbs. Napa cabbage, 1/2 cup kosher salt, 1/4 cup fish sauce, 1/4 cup gochugaru (Korean chili flakes), 1/4 cup sugar, 1/4 cup minced garlic, 1/4 cup minced ginger, 2 tbsp. soy sauce, 1 bunch scallions, thinly sliced.
instructionsRecipe: 1. Cut the Napa cabbage into quarters, lengthwise. Remove the core and chop the cabbage into bite-sized pieces. 2. In a large bowl, toss the cabbage with the kosher salt until well coated. Let sit for 2 hours. 3. Rinse the cabbage well with cold water and drain. 4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the fish sauce, gochugaru, sugar, garlic, ginger, and soy sauce. 5. Add the scallions and stir to combine. 6. Add the cabbage to the spice mixture and mix well with your hands, making sure the cabbage is coated with the mixture. 7. Pack the cabbage into a large jar or airtight container, pressing down firmly to remove any air pockets. 8. Let the kimchi ferment at room temperature for 1-5 days, depending on your preference. Store in the fridge.

name: Udon
ingredientsRecipe: 8 oz. udon noodles, 4 cups chicken broth, 2 cups sliced shiitake mushrooms, 1 cup sliced bok choy, 1 cup sliced carrot, 1/2 cup sliced scallions, 2 tbsp. soy sauce, 1 tbsp. miso paste, 1 tbsp. sesame oil, 2 boiled eggs, sliced, 1 sheet nori seaweed, sliced.
instructionsRecipe: 1. Cook the udon noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside. 2. In a large pot, bring the chicken broth to a boil. 3. Add the sliced shiitake mushrooms, bok choy, carrot, and scallions to the pot. 4. In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, miso paste, and sesame oil. 5. Add the sauce to the pot and stir to combine. 6. Simmer the soup for 5-10 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender. 7. Divide the cooked udon noodles between 2 bowls. 8. Pour the hot soup over the noodles. 9. Top each bowl with sliced boiled egg and nori seaweed. Serve hot.

name: Ramen
ingredientsRecipe: 4 cups chicken broth, 2 cups water, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1-inch piece of fresh ginger, peeled and grated, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 2 teaspoons miso paste, 4 oz. ramen noodles, 4 oz. cooked chicken, shredded, 1 cup fresh spinach leaves, 2 green onions, thinly sliced, 2 soft-boiled eggs, halved, 1 tablespoon sesame oil
instructionsRecipe: 1. In a large pot, bring chicken broth, water, garlic, ginger, soy sauce, and miso paste to a boil. 2. Add the ramen noodles and cook for 2-3 minutes, until tender. 3. Add the cooked chicken and spinach leaves and cook for 1-2 minutes, until the spinach wilts. 4. Divide the soup between 2 bowls. 5. Top each bowl with green onions and a soft-boiled egg. 6. Drizzle with sesame oil.

name: Takoyaki
ingredientsRecipe: 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 large eggs, beaten, 2 cups dashi stock, 1/2 cup chopped cooked octopus, 1/4 cup chopped green onions, 1/4 cup pickled ginger, chopped, 1/4 cup dried bonito flakes, Aonori (dried green seaweed flakes), Takoyaki sauce, Mayonnaise
instructionsRecipe: 1. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, and salt. 2. Add eggs and dashi stock and whisk until smooth. 3. Stir in chopped cooked octopus, green onions, and pickled ginger. 4. Heat a takoyaki pan over medium-high heat. 5. Pour batter into each mold until almost full. 6. Sprinkle bonito flakes and aonori over the batter. 7. Using a skewer, flip the takoyaki balls and cook until golden brown on all sides. 8. Serve hot with takoyaki sauce and mayonnaise.

name: Tamago Sando
ingredientsRecipe: 4 slices white bread, 2 tablespoons mayonnaise, 2 teaspoons Dijon mustard, 1 tablespoon unsalted butter, 4 eggs, Salt and freshly ground pepper, to taste.
instructionsRecipe: 1. Toast the bread until lightly golden. 2. In a small bowl, mix together the mayonnaise and mustard. Spread the mixture over 2 slices of the bread. 3. In a small nonstick skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. 4. Crack the eggs into the skillet and season with salt and pepper. 5. Cook the eggs until the whites are set and the yolks are still runny, about 2-3 minutes. 6. Place the eggs on top of the bread slices with the mayonnaise mixture. 7. Top with the remaining 2 slices of bread. Cut the sandwiches in half and serve.

name: Tender Wrap
ingredientsRecipe: 4 large tortillas, 4 chicken tenders, cooked and sliced, 1/2 cup shredded lettuce, 1/2 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 1/4 cup ranch dressing.
instructionsRecipe: 1. Lay the tortillas on a work surface. 2. Divide the sliced chicken tenders, shredded lettuce, and shredded cheese among the tortillas. 3. Drizzle the ranch dressing over the top of the ingredients. 4. Roll up the tortillas, tucking in the ends to create a snug wrap. 5. Serve immediately.

name: Tender Burger
ingredientsRecipe: 1 lb. ground beef, 1/4 cup breadcrumbs, 1 egg, beaten, 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, Salt and pepper, to taste, 4 hamburger buns, Lettuce, tomato, and condiments of your choice.
instructionsRecipe: 1. In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef, breadcrumbs, egg, Worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. 2. Divide the mixture into 4 equal parts and shape each into a patty. 3. Heat a grill or grill pan over medium-high heat. Cook the patties until browned on both sides and cooked to your desired level of doneness. 4. Toast the hamburger buns. 5. Assemble the burgers with lettuce, tomato, and condiments of your choice.
